entries.text: Coding as a game? Come show off your coding talent with a round of code golf!
entries.title: Fancy a Game of (Code) Golf?

entries.author: tom_wyant
entries.text: Tom proposes deprecation of Astro::Coord::ECI::TLE::Iridium, as the Iridium fleet is updated.

entries.author: kmx
entries.text: Strawberry Perl has released new 5.24 and 5.26 versions

entries.author: zoffix_znet
entries.text: Perl 6 finally gets support for CPAN! It's usable, and you should start using it at once!
entries.title: CPAN6 is here

entries.author: miguel_prz
entries.text:
Great modules released last week;

entries.title: NICEPERL's lists

entries.text: The LPW is coming up on the 25th of November, and the day will end with Lightning talks. Submit yours now!
entries.title: Call For Lightning Talks -- London Perl Workshop

entries.author: mark_keating
entries.text: mdk is getting an early start on preparations for The Perl Conference in Glasgow, August 13-17, 2018. The Call for Papers is now open.
entries.title: Call for Papers

header: I let my weekend get away from me, so I'm hustling around to find you some news. Start planning now for 2018 events! mdk is already hard at work for the European Perl Conference in August, so what's your excuse? Also, kind of huge news on the Perl 6 front--there is a CPAN for Perl 6!
subject: Mad Scrambles sometimes find the coolest news
